EmailTemplate.name: CSP.Send Email 2.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Transforming money movement in the branch
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Platforming for a Digital First World GAIN THE AGILITY YOU NEED TO OWN THE FUTURE ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Being able to seamlessly move money around your financial institution’s network is a critical part of your operations.
COVID-19 put the spotlight on consistent money movement – and brought into sharp focus the impact legacy systems have on ensuring money gets where it needed to be.
In our latest blog, explore how financial institutions can better manage the physical movement of cash across their business. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
